stimulusHtml: How many gallons of water leak out of the tank from t = 0 to t = 3 minutes?

features.html: Water is pumped into an underground tank at a constant rate of 8 gallons per minute. Water leaks out of the tank at the rate of t + 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@38A5@  gallons per minute, for 0 ≤ t ≤ 120 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D42@ minutes. At time t = 0, the tank contains 30 gallons of water.
